code:
flowchart TD
    %% Entry Point
    START([üöÄ Start App]) --> LOGIN{üîê Login}
    
    LOGIN -->|‚ùå Fail| ERROR[‚ùå Login Error]
    ERROR --> LOGIN
    LOGIN -->|‚úÖ Success| ROLE{üë§ User Type}
    
    %% Role Selection
    ROLE -->|üéì Student| STUDENT[üéì Student Dashboard]
    ROLE -->|üë®‚Äçüè´ Professor| PROF[üë®‚Äçüè´ Professor Dashboard]
    ROLE -->|üë©‚Äçüíº Secretary| SEC[üë©‚Äçüíº Secretary Dashboard]
    
    %% STUDENT WORKFLOW
    STUDENT --> S_MENU{üìã Choose Action}
    
    S_MENU -->|üìù New Assignment| S1[üìù Create Assignment]
    S1 --> S1_DB[(üíæ Save to DB)]
    S1_DB --> STUDENT
    
    S_MENU -->|üìÖ Book Meeting| S2[üìÖ Book Appointment]
    S2 --> S2_CHECK{‚úÖ Check Available}
    S2_CHECK -->|‚ùå Not Available| S2_ERR[‚ùå Booking Error]
    S2_ERR --> S2
    S2_CHECK -->|‚úÖ Available| S2_SAVE[(üíæ Save Appointment)]
    S2_SAVE --> S2_NOTIFY[üîî Notify Professor]
    S2_NOTIFY --> STUDENT
    
    S_MENU -->|üìÅ Upload File| S3[üìÅ File Upload]
    S3 --> S3_VALID{‚úÖ Check File}
    S3_VALID -->|‚ùå Invalid| S3_ERR[‚ùå Invalid File]
    S3_ERR --> S3
    S3_VALID -->|‚úÖ Valid| S3_SAVE[(üíæ Save File)]
    S3_SAVE --> STUDENT
    
    S_MENU -->|üëÅÔ∏è View Meetings| S4[üëÅÔ∏è View Appointments]
    S4 --> S4_LOAD[(üìä Load Data)]
    S4_LOAD --> STUDENT
    
    %% PROFESSOR WORKFLOW
    PROF --> P_MENU{üìã Choose Action}
    
    P_MENU -->|üëÅÔ∏è My Assignments| P1[üëÅÔ∏è View Supervised Work]
    P1 --> P1_LOAD[(üìä Load Assignments)]
    P1_LOAD --> PROF
    
    P_MENU -->|üìÖ Manage Meetings| P2[üìÖ Manage Appointments]
    P2 --> P2_ACTION{‚ö° Action}
    P2_ACTION -->|‚úÖ Approve| P2_APP[‚úÖ Approve Meeting]
    P2_ACTION -->|‚ùå Reject| P2_REJ[‚ùå Reject Meeting]
    P2_ACTION -->|üîÑ Reschedule| P2_RESC[üîÑ Reschedule Meeting]
    P2_APP --> P2_NOTIFY[üîî Notify Student]
    P2_REJ --> P2_NOTIFY
    P2_RESC --> P2_NOTIFY
    P2_NOTIFY --> PROF
    
    P_MENU -->|üìä Grade Work| P3[üìä Grade Assignment]
    P3 --> P3_GRADE[üìù Enter Grade]
    P3_GRADE --> P3_SAVE[(üíæ Save Grade)]
    P3_SAVE --> P3_NOTIFY[üîî Notify Student]
    P3_NOTIFY --> PROF
    
    P_MENU -->|üì• Download Files| P4[üì• Download Files]
    P4 --> P4_CHECK{üîí Check Access}
    P4_CHECK -->|‚ùå No Access| P4_ERR[‚ùå Access Denied]
    P4_ERR --> PROF
    P4_CHECK -->|‚úÖ Access OK| P4_DOWN[üì• Download File]
    P4_DOWN --> PROF
    
    %% SECRETARY WORKFLOW
    SEC --> SEC_MENU{üìã Choose Action}
    
    SEC_MENU -->|üë• Manage Users| SEC1[üë• User Management]
    SEC1 --> SEC1_ACTION{‚ö° Action}
    SEC1_ACTION -->|‚ûï Create| SEC1_CREATE[‚ûï New User]
    SEC1_ACTION -->|‚úèÔ∏è Edit| SEC1_EDIT[‚úèÔ∏è Edit User]
    SEC1_ACTION -->|üóëÔ∏è Delete| SEC1_DELETE[üóëÔ∏è Delete User]
    SEC1_CREATE --> SEC1_SAVE[(üíæ Save to DB)]
    SEC1_EDIT --> SEC1_SAVE
    SEC1_DELETE --> SEC1_SAVE
    SEC1_SAVE --> SEC
    
    SEC_MENU -->|üìä Statistics| SEC2[üìä System Stats]
    SEC2 --> SEC2_CALC[üßÆ Calculate Metrics]
    SEC2_CALC --> SEC2_SHOW[üìà Show Dashboard]
    SEC2_SHOW --> SEC
    
    SEC_MENU -->|üóÑÔ∏è View Database| SEC3[üóÑÔ∏è Database View]
    SEC3 --> SEC3_LOAD[(üìä Load Tables)]
    SEC3_LOAD --> SEC3_SHOW[üìã Show Data]
    SEC3_SHOW --> SEC
    
    SEC_MENU -->|üì§ Export Data| SEC4[üì§ Export Data]
    SEC4 --> SEC4_COLLECT[(üìä Collect Data)]
    SEC4_COLLECT --> SEC4_EXPORT[üìÅ Create File]
    SEC4_EXPORT --> SEC4_DOWN[üì• Download]
    SEC4_DOWN --> SEC
    
    %% NOTIFICATIONS
    S2_NOTIFY --> NOTIF[üîî Notification System]
    P2_NOTIFY --> NOTIF
    P3_NOTIFY --> NOTIF
    
    NOTIF --> NOTIF_ACTION{‚ö° Notification Action}
    NOTIF_ACTION -->|üëÅÔ∏è Read| NOTIF_READ[üëÅÔ∏è Mark as Read]
    NOTIF_ACTION -->|üóëÔ∏è Delete| NOTIF_DEL[üóëÔ∏è Delete]
    NOTIF_ACTION -->|‚ö° Action| NOTIF_ACT[‚ö° Execute Action]
    
    NOTIF_READ --> NOTIF_SAVE[(üíæ Update DB)]
    NOTIF_DEL --> NOTIF_SAVE
    NOTIF_ACT --> NOTIF_SAVE
    NOTIF_SAVE --> BACK[üîô Back to Dashboard]
    
    %% DATABASE
    S1_DB --> DB[(üóÑÔ∏è MySQL Database)]
    S2_SAVE --> DB
    S3_SAVE --> DB
    S4_LOAD --> DB
    P1_LOAD --> DB
    P3_SAVE --> DB
    SEC1_SAVE --> DB
    SEC2_CALC --> DB
    SEC3_LOAD --> DB
    SEC4_COLLECT --> DB
    NOTIF_SAVE --> DB
    
    %% LOGOUT
    BACK --> LOGOUT_CHECK{üö™ Logout?}
    STUDENT --> LOGOUT_CHECK
    PROF --> LOGOUT_CHECK
    SEC --> LOGOUT_CHECK
    
    LOGOUT_CHECK -->|‚úÖ Yes| LOGOUT[üö™ Logout]
    LOGOUT_CHECK -->|‚ùå No| CONTINUE[‚ñ∂Ô∏è Continue]
    
    LOGOUT --> LOGIN
    CONTINUE --> RETURN{üîô Return to Dashboard}
    RETURN -->|üéì| STUDENT
    RETURN -->|üë®‚Äçüè´| PROF
    RETURN -->|üë©‚Äçüíº| SEC
    
    %% STYLING
    classDef startStyle fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#0277bd,stroke-width:3px,color:#000
    classDef studentStyle fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#2e7d32,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    classDef profStyle fill:#fff8e1,stroke:#f57c00,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    classDef secStyle fill:#fce4ec,stroke:#c2185b,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    classDef dbStyle fill:#f1f8e9,stroke:#558b2f,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    classDef notifStyle fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1976d2,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    classDef errorStyle fill:#ffebee,stroke:#d32f2f,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    
    class START startStyle
    class STUDENT,S_MENU,S1,S2,S3,S4 studentStyle
    class PROF,P_MENU,P1,P2,P3,P4 profStyle
    class SEC,SEC_MENU,SEC1,SEC2,SEC3,SEC4 secStyle
    class DB,S1_DB,S2_SAVE,S3_SAVE,S4_LOAD,P1_LOAD,P3_SAVE,SEC1_SAVE,SEC3_LOAD,SEC4_COLLECT,NOTIF_SAVE dbStyle
    class NOTIF,NOTIF_ACTION,NOTIF_READ,NOTIF_DEL,NOTIF_ACT notifStyle
    class ERROR,S2_ERR,S3_ERR,P4_ERR errorStyle
